Poject description:

Since i know enough about bars and restaurants i decided to choose this topic for my first atempt at desing/code website. I was happy with the way it looked, the colors, desing, effects. However i tried to fix the media queries recently and ofcourse this website was not thought through so it will not look good under 900px width.
